name: sms.validation.resend
description: Verify your mobile phone number at %domain.name%
text: Hi %user.firstName% %user.lastName%, You have requested that we resend you an mobile number validation token. Please validate your mobile number for %domain.name% by entering the code %sms.validate.token% or clicking on %sms.validate.url%.

placeholders.name: %sms.validate.url%
placeholders.description: A link which the player clicks on to validate his/her email address
